title: GermanFest Returns to Byers’ Choice
author: Staff
excerpt: Bucks County, Pa. — Byers’ Choice Ltd. honors German heritage and culture during a one-day celebration on Saturday, September 24, 2022, from Noon – 4 p.m. Guests will experience a taste of Germany at the 2nd Annual Byers’ Choice Ltd. GermanFest. This family-friendly community event will offer German-inspired fare, craft beer sampling in the garden, […]
content:
Bucks County, Pa. — Byers’ Choice Ltd. honors German heritage and culture during a one-day celebration on Saturday, September 24, 2022, from Noon – 4 p.m.

Guests will experience a taste of Germany at the 2nd Annual Byers’ Choice Ltd. GermanFest. This family-friendly community event will offer German-inspired fare, craft beer sampling in the garden, and a special appearance by master wood carver, Ringo Müller – fourth generation owner of the renowned Müller studio and maker of Christmas nutcrackers and pyramids that are cherished in homes around the world.

Festivity Highlights Include:

  • Wood Carving Demonstrations by Master Wood Carver, Ringo Müller of Seiffen, Germany
  • Large Selection of Christmas Gifts & Décor
  • Classic German-inspired food catered by Tabora Farms of Chalfont, PA
  • Craft Beer in the Garden featuring German varieties provided by Moss Mill Brewing Company — a micro brewery specializing in high quality brews with local ingredients and flavors!
  • Festive music and entertainment provided by strolling accordion player, Bill Aust
  • Antique Beer Stein Display by Chuck Keiser of the “Pennsylvania Keysteiners” club
  • Exclusive Byers’ Choice event Caroler® figurine – “GermanFest Santa”
  • Limited “Create Your Own Witch” Figurine experience; registration required
  • Family Fun for Everyone — PROST!

The festival will take place in the Byers’ Choice Gardens and Visitor Center. Admission and Parking are free. For more information on the Byers’ Choice GermanFest, please visit www.ByersChoice.com  or call 215-822-6700.

About Byers’ Choice Ltd.

Byers’ Choice Ltd. has been handcrafting the nationally-known Carolers® figurines for more than 40 years in Bucks County, PA. The company also produces Advent calendars and other distinctive Christmas and seasonal decorations. The free Christmas Museum at Byers’ Choice attracts more than 70,000 visitors per year. Fall Hours for the Byers’ Choice Museum and Gift Shop are Monday through Saturday, 10 am to 5 pm and Sunday, Noon to 5pm. For more information, visit www.byerschoice.com.
